name: New Trees
description:
New Trees is a walking simulator/visual novel set in Maharashtra, India about old friendships and the passing of time.  Samar is visiting his hometown during the winter break of his senior year of college. He and his childhood friend, Ayaan, go on a walk  and catch up.

 Controls: 

WAD to move the characters

Left Mouse Click or Spacebar to go through dialogue.

Credits:

Varun Saxena - Art, Level Design

Toby Do - Art, Writing

Danny Hawk - Art, Programming, Music

Winner of Best Visuals and Nominee for Best Overall game at the NYU Game Center Global Game Jam.
